resources.string: Shows the details of the song being played and also the player control buttons.
Displays a list of recently played songs. From this screen we can navigate either to the \"Now Playing\" screen or back to the home screen.
Displays a list of latest collections of songs and provides option for purchase
Displays the categories of the songs based on the artists, albums, playlists or all songs
Displays a list of options to control the music player settings.
Tap on the desired option to view the corresponding activity

Payment is made using the IInAppBillingService.

TO_DO : 

Copy the corresponding aidl file
Create the helper classes
Set the billing permission in the manifest file
Creating instance for the helper classes in the onCreate method of this activity
When the "Buy" button is clicked it will initiate the purchase
Implement the onActivityResult Method and the Purchase Finished Listener
Afer the purchase is completed, release the labHelper instances.
